00187             inline irr::scene::IVertexBuffer& IRRBuffer::getVertexBuffer()
00188             {
00189                         return meshBuffer.getVertexBuffer();
00190             }
00191

00193             {

00195             }

00200             }

00202             inline void IRRBuffer::setUsed(size_t nb)
00203             {
00204                         if (nb > nbParticles) // Prevents the buffers from growing
00205                                     nb = nbParticles;
00206 
00207                         getVertexBuffer().set_used(nb * particleVertexSize);
00208                         getIndexBuffer().set_used(nb * particleIndexSize);
00209             }
00210 
00211             inline IRRBuffer* IRRBuffer::clone() const
00212             {
00213                         return new IRRBuffer(*this);
00214             }
00215 
00216             inline bool IRRBuffer::areVBOInitialized() const
00217             {
00218                         return VBOInitialized;
00219             }
00220 
00221             inline void IRRBuffer::setVBOInitialized(bool init)
00222             {
00223                         VBOInitialized = init;
00224             }
